name: Slime Date
description:
Created for a game jam with help from 2Walker2.

The theme was "Flirt" so this is a game about how slimes flirt. Try to match the movements of your partner slime and see if you can keep up enough to impress them.

First, you customize your slime with a variety of colors and styles. Then, you can choose from a selection of potential dates. Finally, you begin the date and see if you can make a good impression on your slime date,

Try to match the timing of your partner. You get more points the more in-sync your movements are!

Controls:

Menus: O is confirm, X is randomize, move the cursor with up/down/left/right.

In-game: Use the directional buttons and the O button to match the movements your partner is about to make.

On the title screen, press O to start, and on the ending screen you can press X to reset.
